title: WTF RIOT
body:
i get into a ranked game and im first ban. league crashes and i cant get back in on time, and i get a fkking 30 timer cause of that?
wtf riot, srsly? 30 minutes?

thats fucking bullshit.

replies.body: A 30 minute timer indicates a history of dodging games, so it sounds like you've been going through a frustrating time.  I'd like to help figure out why it's happening, but I need some more specifics when you say 'crash.'  Are there any error messages?  Let me know with some more details, and I'd be happy to help!
